c =
   \left( \begin{array}{cc}
 {\displaystyle - \frac{\partial^2 w}{\partial x^2} } &
          {\displaystyle - \frac{\partial^2 w}{\partial x \partial y} } \\[2mm]
 {\displaystyle - \frac{\partial^2 w}{\partial x \partial y} } &
          {\displaystyle - \frac{\partial^2 w}{\partial y^2} }

                                     \end{array} \right)
